item.title: Interpreting and Analysing CLIP's Zero-Shot Image Classification via Mutual Knowledge
item.description: CLIP’s zero-shot image classification decisions are made interpretable using a novel mutual-knowledge approach based on textual concepts, demonstrating effective and human-friendly analysis across div…
